function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of AI in drug discovery may lead to misidentification of potential treatments for COVID-19","Impact":"Ineffective or harmful treatments may be administered to patients","Mitigation":"Ensure rigorous scientific checks and clinical trials before approval of treatments","Technologies":"AI-powered drug discovery platforms, deep learning models","People":"Patients, healthcare providers","Owner":"Regulatory bodies, healthcare institutions"},{"Description":"Delayed availability of treatments due to extensive scientific checks and clinical trials","Impact":"Delay in providing effective treatment to COVID-19 patients","Mitigation":"Streamline and expedite the approval process for potential treatments","Technologies":"Clinical trial management systems, regulatory technology","People":"Patients, healthcare providers","Owner":"Regulatory bodies, research institutions"},{"Description":"Potential over-reliance on AI-driven drug discovery","Impact":"Reduced diversity in treatment options and potential oversight of non-AI-driven treatment development","Mitigation":"Balance AI-driven discovery with traditional research methods, encourage diverse research approaches","Technologies":"AI-powered drug discovery platforms, traditional research methods","People":"Patients, healthcare providers, researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, healthcare organizations"}]}
